title: An answer to some considerations on the spirit of Martin Luther and the original of the Reformation lately printed at Oxford.
author: Atterbury, Francis, 1662-1732.
notes: A reply to: Two discourses / Abraham Woodhead [i.e., R.H.].
Written by F. Atterbury. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Copy contains manuscript notations inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
